description.plain:
Giveon Dezmann Evans (born February 21, 1995), known mononymously as GIVĒON, is a breakout R&B artist from Long Beach, California known for his baritone vocals and his heartfelt lyrics. His stage name is his birth name however in capitals with a macron on top of the E. He is signed to Epic Records and Canadian record producer Sevn Thomas’s record label Not So Fast.

GIVĒON had risen to prominence in early March 2020 after being featured on Drake’s “Chicago Freestyle,”. In March 2021, GIVĒON had gained his first #1 on the Billboard Hot 100 after his collaboration with Justin Bieber and Daniel Caesar on “Peaches”.

Despite the attention from his features with Drake and Beiber, the Long Beach native had made a name for himself after his February 2021 track, “HEARTBREAK ANNIVERSARY” had gone viral on the video-sharing platform TikTok in Summer 2021, gaining a whole new audience.

Following the success of his debut EP, TAKE TIME which received a Grammy Awards nomination and his sophomore EP When It’s All Said And Done, GIVĒON had released his debut compilation album, When It’s All Said And Done… Take Time which peaked at #5 on the Billboard 200.

Giveon Dezmann Evans (born February 21, 1995), known mononymously as GIVĒON, is a breakout R&B artist from Long Beach, California known for his baritone vocals and his heartfelt lyrics. His stage name is his birth name however in capitals with a macron on top of the E. He is signed to Epic Records and Canadian record producer Sevn Thomas’s record label Not So Fast.

GIVĒON had risen to prominence in early March 2020 after being featured on Drake’s “Chicago Freestyle,”. In March 2021, GIVĒON had gained his first #1 on the Billboard Hot 100 after his collaboration with Justin Bieber and Daniel Caesar on “Peaches”.

Despite the attention from his features with Drake and Beiber, the Long Beach native had made a name for himself after his February 2021 track, “HEARTBREAK ANNIVERSARY” had gone viral on the video-sharing platform TikTok in Summer 2021, gaining a whole new audience.

Following the success of his debut EP, TAKE TIME which received a Grammy Awards nomination and his sophomore EP When It’s All Said And Done, GIVĒON had released his debut compilation album, When It’s All Said And Done… Take Time which peaked at #5 on the Billboard 200.

songs.title: HEARTBREAK ANNIVERSARY

description.plain:
“HEARTBREAK ANNIVERSARY” is GIVĒON’s first release of 2020, also dropped on his 25th birthday, which is centered on the anniversary of a heartbreak. It serves as the second single to TAKE TIME.

GIVĒON stated that the song is written from the perspective of a close friend on an episode of Genius VERIFIED. The same perspective was used on his November 2019 hit single “LIKE I WANT YOU,” a previous single released from the EP.

songs.lyrics:
66 ContributorsTranslationsDeutschTürkçeHEARTBREAK ANNIVERSARY Lyrics[Intro]
Ooh

[Verse 1]
Balloons are deflated
Guess they look lifeless like me
We miss you on your side of the bed, mmm
Still got your things here
And they stare at me like souvenirs
Don't wanna let you out my head
[Pre-Chorus]
Just like the day that I met you, the day I thought forever
Said that you love me, but that'll last for never
It's cold outside like when you walked out my life
Why you walk out my life?

[Chorus]
I get like this every time
On these days that feel like you and me
Heartbreak anniversary
'Cause I remember every time
On these days that feel like you and me
Heartbreak anniversary, do you ever think of me?
(Oh-ooh) No
(Ooh) No, no, no
(Ooh, ooh) Ooh, nah (Ooh)

[Verse 2]
I'm buildin' my hopes up
Like presents unopened 'til this day
I still see the messages you read, mmm
I'm foolishly patient (Foolishly patient)
Can't get past the taste of your lips (Taste of your lips)
Don't wanna let you out my head

[Pre-Chorus]
Just like the day that I met you, the day I thought forever
Said that you love me but that'll last for never
It's cold outside like when you walked out my life
Why you walk out my life? (My life)
You might also like[Chorus]
I get like this every time
On these days that feel like you and me
Heartbreak anniversary
'Cause I remember every time
On these days that feel like you and me
Heartbreak anniversary, do you ever think of me?
(Oh-ooh) Of me
(Ooh) 'Cause I think of you, think of you
(Ooh, ooh, ooh-ooh)101Embed

songs.full_title: LIKE I WANT YOU by GIVĒON
songs.title: LIKE I WANT YOU

description.plain: “LIKE I WANT YOU” is GIVĒON’s first lead single teasing the release of his debut album TAKE TIME. Stuck and reminiscing on what was, GIVĒON pours out his soul in hopes that his love interest will come back to him. Afraid that that the person has already moved on, he hides his true feelings in a failed attempt to do the same. As stated in interviews, the song was written in the perspective of a close friend rather than in a personal position.

songs.lyrics:
39 ContributorsTranslationsTürkçePortuguêsDeutschFrançaisLIKE I WANT YOU Lyrics[Verse 1]
Sometimes I wish you knew
But I disguise the truth
I say I'm happy but I'm still stuck on us, mm-mm-mm
Does your mind play this game too?
Think 'bout me and you

But I can't make a scene, but I can't make a scene
See you face to face, I'm thinking 'bout the days we used to be
But I can't make a scene, but I can't make it seem
[Chorus]
Like I want you
You, ooh, ooh
Even if it's true, ooh
Ooh-ooh-ooh
Even if it's true

[Verse 2]

Tell me your point of view
Tell me, am I to blame?
You're so good with change, hm-hm-mm
A table set for two
You got me waitin' but you ain't comin' through
Try to stay patient but gotta face the truth, mm-mm-mm
Oh, woah-woah

[Pre-Chorus]
See you face to face (See you face to face), I'm thinking 'bout the days we used to be (Thinking 'bout the days)
But I can't make a scene (No, I can't make a scene), but I can't make a scene (No, no, no, no, oh)
See you face to face (See you face), I'm thinking 'bout the days we used to be (Oh-oh)
But I can't make a scene (No, no-no, no-no), but I can't make it seem

[Chorus]
Like I want you
You, ooh, ooh
Even if it's true, ooh (Even if it's true)
Ooh-ooh-ooh (You, babe)
Even if it's true
You might also like[Bridge]

But if you really love me, say it now

I need you every day, believe me when I say it

[Chorus]

You, ooh, ooh
Even if it's true, ooh
Ooh-ooh-ooh
